trans-unit.source: Here you can assess and customize the services that we'd like to use on this website. You're in charge! Enable or disable services as you see fit.
trans-unit.target: Aquí podètz mesurar e personalizar los servicis que volriam utilizar sus aqueste site web. Avètz lo darrièr mot ! Activatz o desactivatz segon vòstra causida.

trans-unit.source: Services we would like to use
There were changes since your last visit, please renew your consent.
trans-unit.target: I aguèt de modificacions dempuèi vòstra darrièra visita, mercés de repassar vòstre consentiment.

trans-unit.source: Hi! Could we please enable some additional services for {purposes}? You can always change or withdraw your consent later.
trans-unit.target: Adieu ! Poiriam activar mai de servici per {purposes} ? Podètz totjorn modificar o tirar vòstre consentiment mai tard.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to load external content supplied by {title}?
trans-unit.target: Volètz cargar de contenguts extèrn provesits per {title} ?

trans-unit.source: To learn more, please read our {privacyPolicy}.
trans-unit.target: Per ne saber mai, vejatz nòstra {privacyPolicy}.

trans-unit.source: These services process personal information to show you personalized or interest-based advertisements.
trans-unit.target: Aquestes servicis tractan d’informacions personalas per vos mostrar de reclamas personalizadas o basadas suls interèsses.

trans-unit.source: These services are essential for the correct functioning of this website. You cannot disable them here as the service would not work correctly otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Aquestes servicis son essencials pel foncionament corrèct d’aqueste site web. Los podètz pas desactivar aquí pr’amor que lo servici foncionariá pas coma cal autrament.

trans-unit.source: These services process personal information to show you relevant content about products, services or topics that you might be interested in.
trans-unit.target: Aquestes servicis tractan d’informacions personalas per vos mostrar de contenguts a prepaus de produits, de servicis o tèmas que poirián vos interessar.

trans-unit.source: These services process personal information to optimize the service that this website offers.
trans-unit.target: Aquestes servicis tractan d’informacions per optimizar lo servici qu’aqueste site web prepausa.

trans-unit.source: Use this switch to enable or disable all services.
trans-unit.target: Utilizatz aqueste alternator per activar o desactivar totes los servicis.
Activar o desactivar totes los servicis

trans-unit.source: This services is loaded by default (but you can opt out)
trans-unit.target: Aqueste servici es cargar per defaut (mas lo podètz desactivar)
